name: 1-Bit Murder Theater
description:
The laughs of the party are replaced with the screams of pure terror of the guests: a body has been found. Who did it? And with what?

In 1-Bit Murder Theater, the victim, killer, and murder weapon are different every time. Search the house for clues, interrogate the victims, and accuse whoever you think did it. Be quick, though, you only have two minutes...
